languages.text: {n}Октавиана извлекает из-под стола бутылку из стекла толщиной в палец, облепленную сургучными печатями.{/n} "Без преувеличения скажу, что это — лучший амасек, который когда-либо чтил своим визитом этот бар. Джай лично... добыла его, как она выражалась, для особого случая. Похоже, именно вы и есть тот самый особый случай, Ваша Светлость". {n}Компания затихает, смущенно поглядывая друг на друга. Кажется, они не особенно привыкли выпивать в присутствии особ вашего статуса.{/n}

{n}Octaviana draws out a bottle from under the table — the glass is as thick as your finger and it is covered in wax seals.{/n} "With no exaggeration, this is the finest amasec that has ever graced this bar. Jae personally... acquired it, as she says, for a special occasion. It seems that you are the special occasion, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The crowd around the table falls silent, exchanging awkward looks. It would appear they are unaccustomed to drinking in the presence of lofty individuals such as you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜从桌子底下拿出一个瓶子，瓶壁几乎有你的手指那么厚，整个瓶子都封在蜡封里。{/n}“我可没夸张，这瓶酒是这个酒吧有史以来最好的艾玛赛克酒。这瓶酒是……婕伊亲手弄到的，她说只有在特别情况下才能打开。看来她所说的特别情况，指的就是你，大人。”{n}桌边的人都陷入了沉默之中，一脸尴尬地互相看着。他们似乎很不习惯在你这么尊贵的人身边喝酒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana draws out a bottle from under the table — the glass is as thick as your finger and it is covered in wax seals.{/n} "With no exaggeration, this is the finest amasec that has ever graced this bar. Jae personally... acquired it, as she says, for a special occasion. It seems that you are the special occasion, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The crowd around the table falls silent, exchanging awkward looks. It would appear they are unaccustomed to drinking in the presence of lofty individuals such as you.{/n}

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナがテーブルの下からボトルを取り出す…ガラスは指ほどの厚みがあり、ワックスシールで覆われている。{/n}「大げさではなく、このバーの最高のアマセックです。ジェイが個人的に…手に入れたものですよ。彼女が言うように、特別な日のために。その特別な日とは、どうやらあなたのようですね、陛下」{n}テーブルを囲む群衆は沈黙し、気まずそうな表情を浮かべる。彼らはあなたのような高尚な人物の前で酒を飲むことに慣れていないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana draws out a bottle from under the table — the glass is as thick as your finger and it is covered in wax seals.{/n} "With no exaggeration, this is the finest amasec that has ever graced this bar. Jae personally... acquired it, as she says, for a special occasion. It seems that you are the special occasion, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The crowd around the table falls silent, exchanging awkward looks. It would appear they are unaccustomed to drinking in the presence of lofty individuals such as you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナがテーブルの下からボトルを取り出す…ガラスは指ほどの厚みがあり、ワックスシールで覆われている。{/n}「大げさではなく、このバーの最高のアマセックです。ジェイが個人的に…手に入れたものですよ。彼女が言うように、特別な日のために。その特別な日とは、どうやらあなたのようですね、陛下」{n}テーブルを囲む群衆は沈黙し、気まずそうな表情を浮かべる。彼らはあなたのような高尚な人物の前で酒を飲むことに慣れていないようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Octaviana saca una botella de debajo de la mesa. El cristal es tan grueso como tu dedo y está cubierta de sellos de cera.{/n} «Sin exagerar, este es el mejor amasec que hemos tenido en este bar. Jae lo consiguió... personalmente, según dice, para una ocasión especial. Parece que esa ocasión especial es su presencia, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}La muchedumbre en torno a la mesa calla, intercambiando miradas incómodas. Parece que no están acostumbrados a beber en compañía tan ilustre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana draws out a bottle from under the table — the glass is as thick as your finger and it is covered in wax seals.{/n} "With no exaggeration, this is the finest amasec that has ever graced this bar. Jae personally... acquired it, as she says, for a special occasion. It seems that you are the special occasion, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The crowd around the table falls silent, exchanging awkward looks. It would appear they are unaccustomed to drinking in the presence of lofty individuals such as you.{/n}

Jae lo consiguió... personalmente, según dice, para una ocasión especial. Parece que esa ocasión especial es su presencia, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}La muchedumbre en torno a la mesa calla, intercambiando miradas incómodas. Parece que no están acostumbrados a beber en compañía tan ilustre.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Octaviana sort une bouteille de sous la table ; son verre est épais comme votre doigt et recouvert de cachets de cire.{/n} « Sans exagérer le moins du monde, j'ai là le meilleur amasec qu'on ait jamais vu dans ce bar. Jae en a fait personnellement... l'acquisition, comme elle dit, pour une occasion spéciale et il semblerait que cette occasion, ce soit vous, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Le groupe autour de la table se tait et échange des regards gênés. Personne ici ne semble avoir l'habitude de boire en présence d'individus aussi nobles que vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana draws out a bottle from under the table — the glass is as thick as your finger and it is covered in wax seals.{/n} "With no exaggeration, this is the finest amasec that has ever graced this bar. It would appear they are unaccustomed to drinking in the presence of lofty individuals such as you.{/n}

Jae en a fait personnellement... l'acquisition, comme elle dit, pour une occasion spéciale et il semblerait que cette occasion, ce soit vous, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Le groupe autour de la table se tait et échange des regards gênés. Personne ici ne semble avoir l'habitude de boire en présence d'individus aussi nobles que vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Octaviana zieht unter dem Tisch eine Flasche hervor – das Glas der Flasche ist so breit wie ein Finger und es ist bedeckt mit Wachssiegeln.{/n} "Ohne Übertreibung, das ist der beste Amasec, der hier jemals getrunken wurde. Jae hat ihn, so hat sie selbst gesagt, für eine besondere Gelegenheit besorgt. Anscheinend seid Ihr diese besondere Gelegenheit, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Alle am Tisch verstummen und wechseln peinliche Blicke. Offensichtlich sind sie es nicht gewohnt, mit hochgestellten Persönlichkeiten wie dir gemeinsam etwas zu trinken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana draws out a bottle from under the table — the glass is as thick as your finger and it is covered in wax seals.{/n} "With no exaggeration, this is the finest amasec that has ever graced this bar. Jae hat ihn, so hat sie selbst gesagt, für eine besondere Gelegenheit besorgt. Anscheinend seid Ihr diese besondere Gelegenheit, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Alle am Tisch verstummen und wechseln peinliche Blicke. Offensichtlich sind sie es nicht gewohnt, mit hochgestellten Persönlichkeiten wie dir gemeinsam etwas zu trinken.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Octaviana, masanın altından bir şişe çıkarıyor. Camı, parmağın kadar kalın ve bal mumuyla mühürlenmiş.{/n} "Hiç abartmıyorum, bu bara teşrif etmiş en iyi amasektir bu. Jae bizzat... Elde etti. Özel bir an için sakladığını söylüyordu. Görünüşe göre bu özel an sizmişsiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Masanın çevresindeki kalabalık sessizleşiyor, birbirlerine tuhaf bakışlar atıyorlar. Senin gibi yüksek mertebeden biri karşısında içmeye pek alışık olmasalar gerek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana draws out a bottle from under the table — the glass is as thick as your finger and it is covered in wax seals.{/n} "With no exaggeration, this is the finest amasec that has ever graced this bar. Jae personally... acquired it, as she says, for a special occasion. It seems that you are the special occasion, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The crowd around the table falls silent, exchanging awkward looks. It would appear they are unaccustomed to drinking in the presence of lofty individuals such as you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana masanın altından bir şişe çıkarıyor. Camı parmağın kadar kalın ve bal mumuyla mühürlenmiş.{/n} "Hiç abartmıyorum, bu, bu bara teşrif etmiş en iyi amasektir. Jae bizzat... Elde etmiştir ve onu özel bir an için sakladığını söylüyordu. Görünüşe göre bu özel an sizmişsiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Masanın çevresindeki kalabalık sessizleşiyor, birbirlerine tuhaf bakışlar atıyorlar. Senin gibi yüksek mertebeden birinin karşısında içmeye pek alışık değiller gibi duruyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana
